eFiling Guide

  1. Go to SARS eFiling.
  2. Log in with your credentials.
  3. Select “File Return” → “Personal Income Tax”.
  4. Upload your IRP5/IT3(a)s automatically or manually.
  5. Capture deductions exactly as shown in TaxEasy_ZA.
  6. Submit and pay via EFT or credit card.

For help, call SARS 0800 00 7277.
